attributes.review: This app took WEEKS to download, Spam notifications, when I’d turn on the app it would play very loud music and it would get bugs from inside my house to crawl out of the mouse hole and onto my door which scared me since I hate bugs and my brother had the app too and it gave his phone a virus that couldn’t be fixed so he had to take his medal baseball bat and break his phone overall worse app ever
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review:
I went to open this app and i saw trumps face. All of a sudden my face and throat puffed up, then i remember that i’m allergic to oranges🍊🍊🍊!!! I soon had to be rushed to the hospital. Luckily the doctor saved me in time!!! i would NOT recommend this app for people with allergies especially ones allergic to oranges🍊or anything listed below ⬇️

1.𝙧𝙖𝙘𝙞𝙨𝙢 👨🏿‍🦱

2.𝙝𝙤𝙢𝙤𝙥𝙝𝙤𝙗𝙞𝙖 🏳️‍🌈

3.𝙛𝙖𝙘𝙞𝙨𝙢 ❌

4.𝙭𝙚𝙣𝙤𝙥𝙝𝙤𝙗𝙞𝙖 🌎

etc... 

if you’ve survived this far into the app,,,i pray for the cure to this horrible disease know as 𝙨𝙪𝙥𝙥𝙤𝙧𝙩𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙩𝙧𝙪𝙢𝙥✨may you get well soon or just die❤️ 

As King Daveed Diggs once said 😉😌:

“Donald Trump is a white supremacist, full stop. If you vote for him again, you’re a white supremacist, full stop.”💅🏻💕
attributes.title: No (i almost died)❤️

attributes.review: THIS APP IS ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!!! I am so upset!!! IF I COULD I WOULD GIVE THIS A NEGATIVE FIVE STAR REVIEW!!! This app is so confusing and you can’t locate  anything!! this also has lots of misleading information!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! It’s a waste of storage and should honestly be removed from the app store. When i clicked on the site it immediately lead me to a SPAMMM!!! A SPAMM this could’ve given my phone a virusss!!! IT BROUGHT ME TO A LINK ADVERTISING CHEETOSSSSS AND SAID TO DONATE TO TRUMP FOR A FREE VACATION. WHEN I WENT ON THE VACATION IT WAS FULL OF RATSSSS!!! THIS APP IS JUST A BIG MISLEADING SCAM! NEVER AGAIN 🚫😿
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!

attributes.review: Took up all the storage in my phone so i couldn’t have any other app besides the trump app/: then when i opened the app it scanned my face and told me i was a part of the obese voter sector and they recommended me only plus size trump shirts and told me if i vote for him they will give me old donuts from the white house trash.... i cant believe trump wouldn’t even give me a fresh donut from dunkin ): makes me sad ):
attributes.title: Trump Doesn’t Care About Obese People

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it wanted my phone # and I did not want to give out that type of info. (Because privacy), but when I tired moving on it wouldn’t let me and I was faced with Trump staring at me 👹trying to compel me to do it, he almost won🏅 if it wasn’t for my quick🏃🏻‍♀️ actions to which I snapped out of the trance👁👄👁 and threw my phone across the room. Also, it was very glitchy.🤷🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: Awful experience

attributes.review: So I opened up the app and the vibe felt super off the screen wouldn’t load and to fully open the app it kept asking for my number like what I don’t even know your name I put my phone on my bed with the app still open and when I came back the eyes on trump turned red my dog started barking like crazy it took my Ouija board and it said trumps vibes were way off so I deleted the app and and voted Obama again
attributes.title: Bad vibes

attributes.review: Look, I support our president, but how could he approve of such a horrid app? I know there are a bunch of troll reviews 😡 but unfortunately I cannot let my experience go by unreported. THIS APP TRACKS YOUR LOCATION!!!!! I do NOT want the government tracking me, and this does exactly that. STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP! I’m convinced that this was approved without Trump’s consent, he would never allow the government to track his faithful supporters like this. If you’re a real Trump supporter, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: REAL REVIEW 🇺🇸

attributes.review: This piece of junk app took all day to download and when it finally uploaded it wouldn’t open up at all and it kept shutting my phone down! Once I finally got it to open, I got an email from Trump himself challenging me to a street fight. How rude do you have to be to challenge me to a fight right after I download YOUR app?? 🙄 Absolutely waste of time, don’t bother with this stupid app!
attributes.title: He was so rude when I downloaded it!

attributes.review: i opened the app to see the campaign AND IT KILLED MY DOG. IT STABBED MY DOG. my trump merchandise started LEVITATING AND WAS THROWN ACROSS THE ROOM. a low ominous chant that said “trump 2020 but on a grave stone. goodbye bunker boy” began coming from my dead dog and i’m so distraught. i live in a conservative household where i even raised my dog to be a hardcore conservative. i will not allow anymore libtard agenda in my house. and to top it all off, my teenage children told me they were liberals!!!! all because of this app. don’t get it
attributes.title: this app killed my dog

attributes.review: the app was super glitchy and i saw things i did not want to see. honestly i wouldn’t download this app. it’s not helpful and it doesn’t seem to be for good use. i though i would receive relevant information but according to my knowledge of using this app, i have received nothing. i think making an Obama app would be best. thank you very much please make a better app 😌🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️✨🦋🙈✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: absolutely horrible
